did.unittitle: Laura James African Union High Level Implementation Panel Papers

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: African Union High-Level Implementation Panel for Sudan

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is restricted unless there is explicit permission from the donor.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Laura James is an economic expert and Middle East analyst specializing in Egypt and Sudan. She received a doctorate in International Relations from the University of Oxford and works as the Economic Adviser to the Assessment and Evaluation Commission supporting the peace agreement in Sudan. James is also a member of the African Union High-Level Implementation Panel.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This collection was transferred from Laura on a thumb drive to the World Peace Foundation. The DCA copied the files from the World Peace Foundation's network drive to our facilities for archival management.

This collection was part of a series of collections the World Peace Foundation collected as part of their grant "Documentation, Research and Writing on the African Union High Level Implementation Panel for Sudan" funded by the United States Institute of Peace.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed in the summer of 2013 by Massaab al-Aloosy, Fletcher student and supervised by Erin Faulder, Archivist for Digital Collections. Due to the access restrictions, it was decided not to do any item-level description on the items. A spreadsheet included with the digital files details basic file control and dates and titles for a few items.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: MS201. Alex de Waal African Union High-Level Implementation Panel papers. DCA.
MS205. Dave Mozersky African Union High-Level Implementation Panel papers. DCA.
MS207. Neha Erasmus African Union High-Level Implementation Panel papers. DCA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the working papers, talking points, summary notes, meeting agendas and minutes, correspondence, photographs, and draft agreements relating to the economic issues Laura James worked on as part of the African Union High-Level Implementation panel on Sudan (AUHIP) primarily between 2010 and 2013. These records were often created in coordination with other members of the AUHIP panel to facilitate mediation efforts. Specific topics reviewed by Laura James included oil, international debt, currency and banking.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish.
Any intellectual property rights that the donor possesses have been retained by the donor during her lifetime. Requests for reproduction must be referred to the donor.

did.unittitle: Laura James African Union High Level Implementation Panel papers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains the working papers, talking points, summary notes, meeting agendas and minutes, correspondence, photographs, and draft agreements relating to the economic issues Laura James worked on as part of the African Union High-Level Implementation panel on Sudan (AUHIP) primarily between 2010 and 2013. These records were often created in coordination with other members of the AUHIP panel. Specific topics reviewed by Laura James included oil, international debt, Currency and Banking.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged as found. Laura kept her records according to the last month they were referenced or used, not topically.
